review_body: This is a new tourist spot from what I was told. It was quite a unique interesting place with lots of world iconic statues with lights. Unfortunately, the Mgmt did not switch on the lights for every display. A few of them was turn off. But it was still a quite an eye-opener. Worth a trip there after sundown.

review_title: Fantastic, will take your breath away
review_body: Visited while doing the Seoul to Busan bicycle trail. The Italian cathedral is very impressive. Lots of other representations from around the world.
